Class FunctionFactoryUtils

extends Object
    Utility functions for edge function and flow function factories.

    • Method Detail

      • getPointsToSetForValue

        public static soot.PointsToSet getPointsToSetForValue(soot.Value value)
        Gets the points-to set for a given value. The value can be, for example, a variable or a field.
        Parameters:
        value - A value.
        Returns:
        The points-to set for the input value.

      • shouldPropagateSource

        public static int shouldPropagateSource(soot.Value source,
                        List<soot.Value> arguments)
        Determines if a value potentially points to the same location as one of the values in a list. This is useful for example to determine if a variable should be propagated through the boundaries of a called method.
        Parameters:
        source - The reference value.
        arguments - A list of value.
        Returns:
        The index of the element in the list that the reference value is pointing to, or -1 if no common heap location is found.

      • shouldPropagateInstanceField

        public static boolean shouldPropagateInstanceField(soot.jimple.InstanceFieldRef instanceFieldRef,
                                   soot.jimple.InvokeExpr invokeExpr)
        Determines if an instance field should be propagated through a method call. This method only checks propagation rule for the field base. It does not check if the field points to an argument, which should be done outside this method.
        Parameters:
        instanceFieldRef - An instance field reference.
        invokeExpr - An invoke expression for the called method.
        Returns:
        True if the field should be propagated.
